purpose: Facilitates automated web browsing and interaction from within various applications
principle: Utilizes Playwright for headless browser automation and interaction
reusability: Offers a server-based API for integrating web browsing capabilities into other applications
limitations: Primarily supports web-based tasks; may have limitations with complex web page interactions
name: browser-use-mcp-server
description: Browse the web, directly from Cursor etc.
highlight: Enables web browsing capabilities directly from applications like Cursor using Playwright
